item.title: Blocked street drain, 14th July
item.description:
Block Street drain outside number 32 Foxgrove Avenue. BR3 5BA. Street drain is full of vegetation and floods any time it rains. Needs to be sucked out blocking the road and the pavement with water.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Foxgrove Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping again, 14th July
item.description:
Once again I am reporting new fly tipping in Melvin Road SE20 8EU. By a tree along side of 76 Croydon Road there is a John Lewis bag of rubbish and by a tree along side of 78 Croydon Road there are two chairs. I would also like to report the amount of litter in the gutter from the corner of Croydon Road to no. 20 Melvin Road as shown in my photo.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Melvin Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Foliage over Shortlands Rd from Corner House, 14th July
item.description:
Foliage is overhanging over the pavement on Shortlands Road from the old Corner House. This needs to be tended to and removed. This needs to be done promptly by owners in future rather than letting it grow to this level.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shortlands Road, Shortlands, London

item.title: Weeding request, 14th July
item.description:
The bushes on Chipperfield Road opposite the junction with Petersham Drive need to be weened again this year. They looked amazing last year. Also the flower beds outside the dentist and round the corner near to the brilliant Indian Valley all need weeding again. If we are able to do any replanting in any beds that would be amazing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 225, Chipperfield Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Growth around the base that is getting quite big now and needs cutting and trees need pruning, 14th July
item.description:
Growth around the base that is getting quite big now and needs cutting and trees need pruning - resident said they are like 'suckers' growing that need digging out from the root...this is for all the trees down the road...can this be looked into please as they don't want the root to start causing problems as all residents are concerned that these 'suckers' growing are causing problems to the foundations of the properties in the road...
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tavistock Road, East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
